scripts.build: yarn run build:cfg && yarn run build:cpp && yarn run freeze
scripts.build:cfg: cross-var pipenv run conan install . -if build -s build_type=$npm_package_config_buildtype --build missing -o log_level=$npm_package_config_loglevel -o arch=$npm_package_config_arch -o js_runtime=$npm_package_config_runtime -o node_version=$npm_package_config_node -o electron_version=$npm_package_config_electron
scripts.build:cpp: cross-var pipenv run conan build . -bf build -s build_type=$npm_package_config_buildtype
scripts.freeze: cross-var pipenv run conan package . -bf build -pf build/kfc -s build_type=$npm_package_config_buildtype
